member.name: M:Unigine.VR.getHMDResolution(VR::VIEWPORT_TYPE) const
member.summary: Returns the current resolution of the head-mounted display. For HMDs having context (peripheral) and focus displays, you should specify the viewport type.
member.param: Type of the viewport (for HMDs having context (peripheral) and focus displays).

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureMixedReality const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the mixed reality mode is available. Mixed reality enables you to combine real-world view from front-facing cameras mounted on the headset with the VR image rendered. This feature is available for the Varjo devices only. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureEyeTracking const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if eye tracking is available. This feature is available for the Varjo devices only. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureHandTracking const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if hand tracking is available. This feature is available for the Varjo devices only. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureTrackingSpaceRaw const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if poses can be provided in the coordinate system defined by the tracker driver. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureMotionPrediction const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if motion prediction is available. This feature is available for the Varjo devices only. It allows the engine to submit the velocity from the GBuffer to the Varjo Composer. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureFoveatedRendering const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if foveated rendering is available. This feature is available for the Varjo devices only. Foveated rendering enhances performance by using the eye tracking functionality in Varjo headsets: it decreases the image quality in the peripheral areas where the user is not looking. Foveation allows applications to render fewer pixels and achieve a better VR experience. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureReportProximitySensor const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if proximity sensor reporting is available. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureSupportForTreadmill const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the user treadmill support is available. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureSupportForBaseStations const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the base stations support is available. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureSupportForTrackers const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if support for trackers is available. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureSupportForRenderModelComponents const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if support for render model components is available. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.resetZeroPose const
member.summary: Sets the zero pose to the current tracker position.
member.returns: true if the pose is reset successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureSupportForRenderModel const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if VR API can provide Render Models for the controllers. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureFadeToColor const
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the FadeToColor feature is available. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureFadeGrid const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if the FadeGrid feature is available. If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.hasFeatureGetAudioDevice const
member.summary: Returns the value indicating if VR API can return Audio Device name (usually Oculus only). If VR is not initialized, the function will return false.
member.returns: true if the feature is available; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.fadeToColor(float,Unigine.Math.vec4,bool)
member.summary: Fades the engine render to the specified color over time.

member.name: M:Unigine.VR.fadeGrid(float,bool)
member.summary: Fades the engine render to/from the grid over the specified time.
member.param: true fades render to grid; false fades grid to render.

member.summary: The first element to be used for iteration.

member.summary: Showing the mirrored image is disabled.

member.summary: The main window shows the mirrored image.

member.summary: The first element to be used for iteration.

member.summary: Poses are provided in the coordinate system defined by the tracker driver.

member.summary: Poses are provided relative to the seated zero pose.

member.name: F:Unigine.VR.TRACKING_SPACE_STANDING
member.summary: Poses are provided relative to the safe bounds specified by the user.

member.name: F:Unigine.VR.TRACKING_SPACE_END
member.summary: The last element to be used for iteration.
